bibl.bibl: Abbot, Francis Ellingwood. 1873. The inside history of the Index Association. A report on the recent “Index troubles” made to the stockholders of the Index Association, at their second annual meeting in Toledo, Ohio, June 7, 1873. Cambridge, Mass.: Press of John Wilson & Son.
bibl.idno: Collected in vol. 2 of Harvard College Class of 1859, Harvard College Alumni writings. Separately published and paginated. Cambridge: Press of J. Wilson. Harvard’s Widener Library. EducU 4810.2859 vol. 2. Hollis number 007965308. PDF in P:/Alison/1873
